nodes.text: Widely known as the Republic recon speeder, the Gaba-18 was an airspeeder used by the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars for frontline operations on contested and enemy worlds.

The recon speeder was modified for military use. It was painted in the red-and-white hues adopted by the Grand Army of the Republic and featured a cockpit protected by a bubble canopy that could seat a single pilot. The speeder was lightly shielded, and featured a blaster cannon mounted on the forward hull.

Republic recon speeders were deployed to support frontline operations, often scouting ahead in advance of larger Republic vehicles.
The speeder could fly over a variety of terrain, including rocky environments such as the landscape of Geonosis.
